It is uniquely positioned by its fully autonomous 'Storyline' technology that correlates events into a single, actionable thread for rapid response, making it a top choice for enterprises seeking to consolidate security tools and reduce mean time to response (MTTR).. Thinking Machine Labs, on the other hand, is Thinking Machine Labs is a research-driven AI company, co-founded by Mira Murati, building advanced AI systems designed for complex reasoning and problem-solving. It focuses on developing multi-modal foundation models that can understand and generate text, code, and visual data to tackle enterprise-scale challenges. The company is distinguished by its emphasis on scientific discovery and building 'generally capable' AI agents, positioning itself as a next-generation competitor in the frontier AI space..
